page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: hall but if it is warm we play rounders because we are having a big tournament,you win a little silver cup. We also get gym once a month on Thursdays with the proper gym teacher. .We have a big {sports day} at the end of term with three houses,the houses are:{ {FEDDAL,ORCHIL}and {ARDOCH}.The Muirs presented Braco with the cup in 1931 which is still in use ,they call it the Muir cup. Mrs Bailey our sewing teacher comes every 3 weeks on Mondays and Mrs Halliday comes every 3 weeks on Mondays as well,she comes the week after Mrs Bailey.We are doing a project just now on the Knaik one of the local burns.We are also doing a project on Scotland's Story which is all about the History of Scotland.
